sentences.en: He looked for the dramatic, like the sunset in this painting, and painted it with great verve.
sentences.cn: 他追求画面的表现力—就像这幅画里的落日—而且创作时充满激情。

sentences.en: He was almost fizzing with combat verve.
sentences.cn: 投入战斗的急切心情几乎叫他达到了兴奋的状态.

sentences.en: He's a poor singer, but we had to admire the sheer verve of his performance.
sentences.cn: 他是个不高明的歌手, 但是我们必须称赞他表演纯粹的神韵.

sentences.en: It is moreover a book of astonishing wit and verve.
sentences.cn: 这还是一本充满惊人的机智和活力的小说。

sentences.en: It is moreover a book of astonoshing wit and verve.
sentences.cn: 这还是一本充满惊人的机智和活力的小说.

sentences.en: No personal impulses can be felt in it; not a stroke has any verve.
sentences.cn: 既见不到他个人的情感, 也看不出有哪一笔下得生动有力.
罗莎带着巨大的热情写作.

sentences.en: That magazine has a lot of verve.
sentences.cn: 那个杂志办得很有生气.

sentences.en: The audience rose to his verve and wit.
sentences.cn: 观众们对他生气勃勃和富于机智的表演热烈喝彩.

sentences.en: The parallels illustrate the growing verve of outbound M & A efforts by China's state - owned enterprises.
sentences.cn: 两桩类似的交易说明了中国 国有 企业对 海外 收购日益高涨的热情.

sentences.en: To face of the live, we must have the decisive determination and the never regretted verve.
sentences.cn: 面对人生, 要有当机立断的决心,也要有永不后悔的气魄.

sentences.en: Unique design with verve endows the building group a large , stately residence, modernized and simple style.
sentences.cn: 独具神韵的设计风格使建筑群显得庄重大气, 现代简约.

sentences.en: Viewers and creative verve are drifting steadily from broadcast to cable networks.
sentences.cn: 观众数量以及节目制作者的创作热情正不断从一般电视节目转向有线电视领域.

sentences.en: What happened to personality, verve and humor?
sentences.cn: 你要的个性, 气魄,还有幽默 呢 ?

sentences.en: Your impudent look reflects my verve when I was young.
sentences.cn: 你无耻的样子很有我当年的神韵.

trans.tran_cn: 热情，（艺术品等的）气韵，神韵，生气，活力，气魄
